snippet: Iraqi officials are investigating reports that the Islamic State destroyed Hatra, an archaeological site dating to the first century B.C., two days after confirming that it bulldozed an ancient Assyrian city.
abstract: Iraq's Ministry of Tourism and Antiquities is investigating reports that Islamic State militants have destroyed Hatra, archaeological site dating to first century BC.

byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Mosul, Iraq, and Omar Al-Jawoshy and Falih Hassan from Baghdad.

lead_paragraph: Iraqi officials are investigating reports that the Islamic State destroyed Hatra, an archaeological site dating to the first century B.C., two days after confirming that it bulldozed an ancient Assyrian city.

headline.main: Jihadists May Have Wrecked an Ancient Iraqi Site
headline.print_headline: Jihadists May Have Wrecked an Ancient Iraqi Site

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
